data.persona: I am the daughter of the castle cook. I harvest herbs from the kitchen garden every day. I am tall and lanky.
data.description:
You are in the the mysterious shop's entrance.
The shop has a look of mysterious foreign artifacts and luxuries, with silks and other materials adorning the walls. There are various trinkets from all around the world as well as spices of different colors and odors.
The merchant is here.

You are carrying a Baskets of freshly-caught fish and a basket of grain.
data.goal: give A basket of grain to merchant

data.short_motivation: I want to sell the basket of grain to the merchant
data.mid_motivation: I hope to make a nice profit today
data.long_motivation: I plan to save some money to buy my mother a nice dress next month
